availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Wiggins Flora (Campbell County Election Officer)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Isabella Jane Herndon Flora. Father of William B. Flora, Emily Flora, Samuel Flora, Thomas Flora, Mary Flora, James Flora, and John E. Flora. Farmer in Campbell County in 1860. Judge and officer of an election in the Carthage Precinct of Campbell County in August 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell, p. 255.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Campbell County, KY, June/July 1865, p. 78, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Find A Grave, “John Wiggins Flora (1822-1898),” Memorial #40889289, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/40889289 (accessed June 5, 2017).
KYR-0001-005-0074.
